description: System-generated unique identifier for a technician certification category used for referencing and joins across systems.
Official title of the technician certification category displayed to users and on reports.
Free-text details about the certification categoryâ€”e.g., administering authority, scope, or exam notes; likely supplemental context beyond the title; confirm with SME.
